text: he

so this morning in watching the little drama unfold the lizard versus the fly i was curious as to whether or not this lizard was going to catch this fly and away while i'm watching the soldan in thinking about a conversation i had recently with some one
i wanted to jump my problem on her but i couldn't get a word in
she started with her health problems
in problems systemic problems and the problems with her toes then she went on to explain about her many allergies and about the many things she cannot eat
came the electroplated restaurants and the evils of meat then it was on to her mantris and tribulations about her house then
the different appliances and their maladies and then i thought to myself well she's going to get ever get to the end of all this but no
then it came to her children and the men problems with her children one forty and the other thirty five
he went on to suggest that her religion was not living up to her promise after all
he was a miser most of the time and she felt guilty about all her pleasures
i managed to get a word in and suggested that a religion is a religion of hate fear guilt and misery how else would they control her
i said she ought to study at the cabala
after all if her religion can make her feel guilty about the god given pledges of her intimates when she's alone in her bedroom a powerful religion is that
he suggested that she get rid of her religion and she would have less to complain about more life to enjoy
as for me how well could i suggest such a thing
it was my turn
i tried to get my complaints and my negative additions to the conversation but
i could get a word images amazing isn't it how much pleasure we get out of being negative and complaining
i wanted to myself
actually go to ours without thinking a negative thought
finding things to complain about god
three hours
